summary: A wealthy man working in an advertising agency and a dedicated doctor fall in love and marry. When his wife dies, the devastated man must fulfil her last wishes.
cast: Salman Khan|Preity Zinta|Bhoomika Chawla|Rati Agnihotri|Helen|Renuka Shahane|Aasif Sheikh|Viju Khote|Riya Sen|Delnaaz Irani|Mukesh Ahuja|Bobby Darling|Stephen Fernandes|Gulshan|Dinesh Hingoo|Vidyut Jammwal|Shashi Kiran|Tarun Mehta|Suresh Menon|Shashi Mishra|Ishwar Patel|Kainaaz Pervees|Pappu Polyester|Harish Shetty|Gurpal Singh|Sanjay Swaraj|Gary Tantony|Dinyar Tirandaz|Mahendra Verma
title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kaha
